```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
files <- list.files("data/tidy/", pattern = "ppm")
data <- lapply(paste0("data/tidy/", files), read_csv) %>% bind_rows()
data
```

```{r}
data %>% 
  filter(ch4_ppm < 6) %>% 
  # filter(ecosystem == "NW", timepoint != "t3") %>% 
  mutate(min_elapsed = case_when(
    timepoint == "t0" ~ 0,
    timepoint == "t1" ~ 7,
    timepoint == "t2" ~ 17,
    timepoint == "t3" ~ 27,
    timepoint == "t4" ~ 37),
    min_elapsed = as.numeric(min_elapsed)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = min_elapsed, y = ch4_ppm, color = factor(rep))) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ecosystem)
```
